## Welcome! 
I am a **Lecturer** in [the Department of Economics](https://lsa.umich.edu/econ) at [the University of Michigan Ann Arbor](https://www.umich.edu/).

My fields of interest include **Empirical Industrial Organization**, **Applied Microeconomics**, and **Applied Econometrics**.

Currently, I am teaching Econometrics and Enviornmental/Resource Economics course at U-M.
